root.name: Energy Breaker
root.description: OverviewEnergy Breaker is an isometric strategy RPG developed by Neverland and published by Taito in 1996 for the Super Famicom. The game is most well known for having character designs by Yasuhiro Nightow, the creator of Trigun, and for being the last game Neverland developed for the Super Famicom.TranslationEnergy Breaker fan translationThe English patch for Energy Breaker was one of the longest ongoing rom hacking projects ever, taking almost 12 years to complete. The project was headed by Disnesquick with satsu acting as translator for more than 9 years. After alot of hard work the English translation patch was finally released on September 23, 2012 and can be downloaded at the project's website.
